Name: They Love Them
About the game: They Love Them is a romantic match-3 puzzle game. Impress your date by showering them with gifts and affection. Match 3 gifts to send them to your partner. Quickly send gifts to maintain a combo. Play in a relaxing date mode, or rack up points as quickly as you can in the Speed dating mode!
